title: Everyone knows your location: tracking myself down through in-app ads
author: apokryptein
aiHeadline: Big Brother is Watching You, and So Are the In-App Ads: A Thrilling Tale of How Your Location is Being Tracked Down by Those Annoying Ads That Just Won't Quit, Because Apparently, Everyone Needs to Know Your Every Move, All the Time, and We're Not Even Kidding

title: CDC: Unpublished manuscripts mentioning certain topics must be pulled or revised
author: KittenInABox
aiHeadline: CDC Orders Mass Retraction of Unpublished Manuscripts, Because Who Needs Free Speech Anyway, and Definitely Not When It Comes to Certain Sensitive Topics That Might Just Expose the Truth, So Let's Just Pretend We Never Said Anything and Move On, Shall We?

title: Recent results show that LLMs struggle with compositional tasks
author: marban
aiHeadline: Breaking News: LLMs Struggle with Compositional Tasks, Which is Just a Fancy Way of Saying They're Not as Smart as They Think They Are, and Maybe We Should Stop Expecting Them to Solve World Hunger and Just Stick to Playing Chess or Something, Because Let's Face It, They're Not Exactly the Next Einstein

title: Life is more than an engineering problem
author: biomene
aiHeadline: Life is More Than an Engineering Problem, But Don't Tell That to the Engineers Who Are Trying to Solve It with Code and Circuit Boards, Because Apparently, They Think They Can Fix Everything with a Few Lines of Code and a Pocket Protector, But Spoiler Alert: They Can't, and That's What Makes Life So Deliciously Complicated

title: Show HN: Lume â€“ OS lightweight CLI for MacOS and Linux VMs on Apple Silicon
author: sandropuppo
aiHeadline: Introducing Lume, the Lightweight CLI for MacOS and Linux VMs on Apple Silicon, Because Who Doesn't Need Another OS to Worry About, and What's a Few More VMs Between Friends, Right, and Don't Even Get Us Started on the Joy of Configuring Yet Another CLI, But Hey, At Least It's Not as Painful as Setting Up a Windows Desktop, So There's That
